txt.en: The merrevail of Angmar are wretched creatures, corrupted beyond recall. They rejoice only in gloom and misery and seek always to destroy all that is light. Even the oppressing dark of Moria is not enough to quench their thirst for blackness and despair.
Merrevail from Angmar have crept into Moria during the dwarves' long absence to lurk in the shadows, preying upon all that remains of good in that forsaken place.
